titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of University Health, Yale University, Records
Department of University Health, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday November 30, 2018 at 10:09

did.unittitle: Department of University Health, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of administrative files, correspondence, reports, and student and staff records documenting the operations of the Department of University Health at Yale University.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Dept. of University Health

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 35 (YRG 35), Records documenting Yale health services.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of University Health, Yale University, Records (RU 557). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of administrative files, correspondence, reports, and student and staff records documenting the operations of the Department of University Health at Yale University.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by subject.
